long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export Your X(Formerly Twitter) Network with Ease Using XExporter. Managing your network can be a hassle, especially when you want to analyze your followers or the accounts you follow. That's where the handy XExporter extension comes in. 

XExporter allows you to easily export your followers or following list to a CSV/JSON/XLSX(Excel) file, without needing any programming knowledge. Here's how it works:
1. Enter a Twitter Username or click the download button
Simply input any public Twitter handle into the XExporter popup window. 
You can also click the download button on the user’s profile page.
3. Click Export
Wait for the extension scrape and click the download button to save in CSV/JSON/XLSX(Excel) format.

That's it! XExporter will quickly scrape the data and download a CSV file to your computer.

The exported file contains useful details like name, username, account creation date, bio, follower/following counts, location, etc. 

If you need an easy way to back up or analyze your Twitter connections, try XExporter. The extension makes exporting followers and following lists a breeze.

Data Privacy
Your data stays on your device and is not stored or transmitted to our servers. We prioritize keeping your information secure and confidential.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with Twitter.
